changeSet.sql: WITH series AS ( SELECT generate_series(1, 100) AS sery ) INSERT INTO users ("name", surname, "age", gender, username, "password", inserted_date_at_utc) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'Vlad' WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'Nastya' WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'Katya' WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'Polina' WHEN s.sery % 11 = 0 THEN 'Yarick' ELSE 'Andrew' END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'Kolyago' WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'Yurkova' WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'Kamenko' WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'Starostenko' WHEN s.sery % 11 = 0 THEN 'Vasilevski' ELSE 'Yuriev' END, random()*(65-14)+14, CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'MALE'::gender_enum WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'FEMALE'::gender_enum WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'FEMALE'::gender_enum WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'FEMALE'::gender_enum WHEN s.sery % 11 = 0 THEN 'MALE'::gender_enum ELSE 'MALE'::gender_enum END, 'User' || s.sery, lpad(s.sery::varchar, 6, '0'), '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'::TIMESTAMP + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '7 day' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 24))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 hour' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 minute' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 second' FROM series s
